column4: you must have a valid root password to use webadmin, sudo is not sufficient
what they mean is check backports, get libdvdcss, then uncheck it. That qualifies as 'not regularly' :)
i already install vlc and libdvdcss2, i can play DVD movies, but i got no sound, what might cause the problem?
I don't have a dvd, so I don't have a clue :)
no, just get the libdvdcss or whatever, then uncheck backports again
ok thx
it would be best to just do sudo apt-get install libdvdcss from the command line
yup.. i already installed it and dvd movies are working, and the sound is working too now :)
no, no sharing of mboxes, but you can use dovecot-imapd to maintain a mail store both can use
actually i'm POP-ing from gmail, is it possible to use that dovecot-imapd ?
I would think so, I pop from my net email account and drop it where dovecot can see it
ok, let me try it
on second thought, maybe i just use thunderbird and uninstall evolution
btw, what's the different between 'removal' and 'complete removal' ? is 'removal' doesn't clean all the files?
hmmm synaptic don't do that i guess
but aptitude do that? i should've known earlier :D
I think it's supposed to. I'm not sure if aptitude and synaptic use the same package tracking mechanism, tho
i was installing kubuntu-desktop, when i uninstall it didn't uninstall all the packages installed with kubuntu-desktop, so i have to uninstalled the rest manually
yes, that's why I use aptitude :)
*nods*
/usr/share/doc/aptitude/README
